briefdescription.para: This profile enables a device to expose the controls and state of a device that can control the volume of an audio output such as one or more speakers and Control the peer device audio output as a client.

detaileddescription.para: VCS may include zero or more instances of VOCS, AICS. VCP which is the client side of the volume Control Service consists of APIs to control volume and gain of a peer device. It acts as client for VCS, VOCS and AICS
